text: @JaneRuth_Aceng Some feel COVID-19 is no big threat. Hunger, malaria, other diseases in addition to limited access to health care  devour them like chicken feed daily. Continued lockdown could be more risky for these groups. Possibly why sex workers continue to expose themselves. What plans?
